import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function ProductList({ products }) { // Destructure products from props return (
{products.map((product) => (
{product.pname}
${product.price}
{product.pstock && (
{product.pstock}
)}
Add To Cart Buy Now
))}
); } export default ProductList;
